title: Zelensky says dozens of towns and villages in the Kherson region have been liberated.
dc:creator: Andrew E. Kramer and Dan Bilefsky

media:content.media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Ukrainian soldiers celebrate the liberation from Russian troops in Snihurivka, along the Kherson front in southern Ukraine, on Thursday.
